# Bootstrapping

## Installation

To get the latest version, install from GitHub as follows:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
 # First install devtools if needed
if(!require(devtools)) install.packages("devtools")

# Install dvir from GitHub
devtools::install_github("thoree/kinBoot")
```

The implementation relies heavily on 
the `ped suite` of R-libraries, in particular **forrel**.
